anonOnLeaderboard.label: Anonymize on leaderboards
anonOnLeaderboard.tip: When selected, replaces this character's name with "Anonymous Walker" on the leaderboards. Note: If your profile visibility is set to "Friends only", then your friends can still see the character's name on the leaderboards.

hideSteps.label: Hide steps
hideSteps.tip: When selected, hides this character's total step count to all other users. This character will also be hidden on the Total Steps leaderboard.
